item.title: Buy the dip: Microsoft is the best 'pure play' on AI adoption, says Piper Sandler
item.description: The investment firm named shares a top pick following the stockâ€™s big post-earnings fall last week.

item.title: The AI trend can give dividend aristocrats a boost, Raymond James says
item.description: After years of underperformance, the tide could be starting to shift for dividend stocks, according to Raymond James.

item.title: Wells Fargo and Bernstein upgrade FedEx ahead of investor day next week
item.description: Wells Fargo and Bernstein respectively see upside of 13% and 27% ahead for FedEx.

item.title: JPMorgan turns bullish on SoFi, cites growth momentum and attractive entry point
item.description: JPMorgan's $31 price target implies that shares of SoFi could rise 41% from their current levels.

item.title: Palantir soars after strong earnings. What analysts highlighted, including accelerating AI demand
item.description: Analysts remained overwhelmingly bullish on Palantir, although the company's lofty valuation stood out as a sore spot for some.
